title: Doctors Sound Alarm Over Global Surge in Cancers Among Young People Since Pandemic With No Obvious Cause
description:
Doctors across the world are sounding the alarm over a surging epidemic of young people being diagnosed with cancers since the pandemic, with no obvious explanation for what lies behind it.

The post Doctors Sound Alarm Over Global Surge in Cancers Among Young People Since Pandemic With No Obvious Cause appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.

title: EU Border Force Chief Admits He Doesn’t Want to Keep Migrants Out of Europe
description:
The head of Frontex, the EU's border and coastguard agency, has said he doesn't think it is really possible or desirable to keep migrants out of Europe. Unfortunately, that's his job.

The post EU Border Force Chief Admits He Doesn’t Want to Keep Migrants Out of Europe appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.

title: Fears for Patients as NHS Introduces Electric Ambulances in Net Zero Drive
description:
The NHS is to introduce electric ambulances, raising concerns that its drive for Net Zero is being put above patient safety owing to the limited range and long charging times.

The post Fears for Patients as NHS Introduces Electric Ambulances in Net Zero Drive appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.

title: There is No Such Thing as Long Covid, Say Health Officials
description:
Long Covid is no different from the after-effects of viruses like flu and people should stop using the term, health experts have said.

The post There is No Such Thing as Long Covid, Say Health Officials appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.

title: German Police Pull a 16 Year-Old Girl out of Class and Tell Her to Stop Posting Smurf-Themed AfD-Friendly Content to TikTok
description:
Police officers in Germany pulled a 16 year-old girl out of class and told her to stop posting Smurf-themed AfD-friendly content to TikTok, a move defended by a Minister as "preventing her from committing a crime".

The post German Police Pull a 16 Year-Old Girl out of Class and Tell Her to Stop Posting Smurf-Themed AfD-Friendly Content to TikTok appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.

title: Coral Growth at the Great Barrier Reef has “Exploded” in Recent Years
description:
Coral numbers on the Great Barrier Reef have "exploded" in recent years despite highly publicised episodes of bleaching, according to a recently published report.

The post Coral Growth at the Great Barrier Reef has “Exploded” in Recent Years appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.

title: News Round-Up
description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the virus and the vaccines, the ‘climate emergency’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.

The post News Round-Up appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
